article.title: McDonnell Douglas Receives Contract for Focused Lethality Munitions-Small Diameter Bomb I Variant
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force is modifying a firm-fixed-price contract with McDonnell Douglas Corporation for $7 million. This action will purchase 100 Focused Lethality Munitions-Small Diameter Bomb I Variant.
